word:
I wish to write words that shall remove from the minds of any of my brethren the impression that I did not, before their publication, read the pages in Testimony for the Church, volume nine. . . . My discourses are reported, and what I write by hand is copied out by faithful helpers. Before 


                                    -22- 

any of this matter is printed, it is read over and closely examined by me. --Letter 94, 1910, pp. 1, 2. (To William Duce, July 12, 1910.) 

Released May 20, 1977.
